body:
Hi everybody,



I'm trying to estimate the glare potential using the file on hydra.

When I run your geometry, everything works well. Just I change the geometry of the room, I don't have any results.

How is it possible? Any ideas to solve the problem?



Attached is the grasshopper file with the new geometry.

Thank you so much.



Andrea
topic: No results Sunlight analysis hour_change GEOMETRY

replies.body:
Hi Andrea,

Check Surface Normal, and Flip your surface Geometry by Flip component.

best,

Omid.
